name: 2.0.0-M3
description: Java 8, Datanucleus upgrade, Remove deprecated features, JEE compatibility, meta annotations, Spring Boot for IoC

issues.title: [WONT FIX] Use bundled JARs instead of plain ones
[Duplicate] JEE Support - container-provided connection pools
[WON'T FIX] Parser for java.util.Date should respect the configuration settings.
[WON'T FIX] Remove LogonFixture
[WON'T FIX] Not properly recognizing Collections of generics as Action return type
[WON'T FIX] Domain Object not validated by Isis before being sent to the database and RuntimeException handling on IsisTransactionManager
[WON'T FIX] Provide formal API for IsisTransactionManager/PersistenceSession so that other viewers can correctly handle such things as data integrity exceptions.
[WON'T FIX] Unable to render java.lang.Number in UI
[WON'T FIX] bootlint error when attempting to view an object with no perms
[WON'T FIX] isis-maven-plugin validate goal is not thread-safe
[DUPLICATE] swagger service should return its "regions" alphabetically, so rendered sensibly in swagger-ui
[WON'T FIX] (non-fatal) ConcurrentModificationException when invoking an action
JAXB view model: setting class-level editing=enabled not honored
[WON'T FIX] JAXB view model: setting view's properties via PostConstruct method not honored
JDODataStoreException not handled properly by the framework
AuditerService not being called
Allow enums to implement interfaces for choices (also fixed in "v1 maintenance")
[NOT AN ISSUE] Blob/Clob Properties throw when Inline Editing (Ajax)
[WONT-FIX] Tables: Object Columns should be sortable by displayed Object Titles
Prevent ajax js error for inlinePromptLink on scalar panel (also fixed in "v1 maintenance")
Avoid error in downloadMetaModelXml, CommandPersistence.NOT_PERSISTED facet not decoded correctly (also fixed in "v1 maintenance")
Don't redundantly add additional DisabledFacet when disabled at class-level (also fixed in "v1 maintenance")
Increase timeout to avoid occasional exceptions when download Blobs  (also fixed in "v1 maintenance")
SimpleApp build/validate/test needs fixing for v2
Common actions not shown, even when explicitly listed in layout.xml
TimestampService is broken
Blob/Clob-Panel's Download Button might reference invalid content.
Mixins are broken. Don't seem to be recognized, thus ignored.
WepApp's main() should just work out of the box
Persistable mixins not showing in the demo apps.
Internal API: _Tasks with ThreadPoolSupport must not suppress nested Exceptions
Secman: Non-existing User gets created in DB even though not authenticated via LDAP
@PersistenceCapable(schema=...) is no longer being used to derive objectType
Fallback to home page (in event of action returning null) throws an IllegalArg
BookmarkService doesn't seem to lookup correctly
Fix NPE when rendering a domain object with null property in RO viewer.
Fixes algorithm for determining if a domain action is "public" visible (ie no entities)
Orphaned validation (when @Action is NOT mandatory) isn't working.
When web browser is narrow, sidebar always shown.
Selecting request header options (profiles) in swagger-ui does not work.
RestClient smoketest is broken
Dependend Args within Dialogs do not work for AutoComplet, Disable and Hide
Toggle View is hiding DOM elements which should be visible
autoComplete, default, choices don't get added to the MM
CSS fix for drop down panel (eg vertical '...' on metadata tab)
Ensure Command executor is set to USER when running integ tests.
ToggledMementosList can exceed Size of underlying Collection
Actions fail MM Validation when associated (Hotfix)
on-the-fly-introspection may occur even though MM was eagerly loaded
Revert a little bit of the joda to j8 stuff.
Rest Response Doesn't Contain Number With "multiLine"
[NOT-AN-ISSUE] demoapp.dom.types.blob.BlobDemo: menuBars suggest GET, implementation requires POST?
objectSpec expected to have EncodableFacet
Demo: action 'runFixtureScript' either does not exist or is not visible
Demo/RO: restful/menuBars Contains Unexpected Element
SecMan listAll Classes: types of @DomainService(nature=NatureOfService.VIEW) are missing
(possible regression): if sidebar is activated, then cannot access menu items (z-order)
HTTP 400 when rendering Object w/ ObjectId containing slashes
Fix the ability to inject into Specifications
ChangedObjectsService doesn't reset enlisted pojos at end of xactn -> memory leak.
@RequestScoped isn't honoured
Regression: Markup rendering is broken
Values of @EmbeddedOnly type should not render logo or title if absent
[WON'T FIX] Pinnable (and persistable) bookmarks
[WON'T FIX] Implement generic Spec Transformers for BDD tests
[WON'T FIX] To improve performance, support the use of data pinned to caches for entities that are intended to be reference data.  For these, infer the ImmutableFacet.
[DUPLICATE] Allow action parameters to be defaulted based on the (change of) value of other parameters.

[WON'T FIX] JDO/Wicket/RO: provide support for a number of built-in value types (eg BaseNumber, BaseString, BaseDate... to support Money, Reference, Note, Description); annotated with @Mask annotation
[DUPLICATE] Allow action parameters to be dynamically disabled or even hidden based on either object state or on the values for other objects.
[WON'T FIX] Use @DomainService(repositoryFor=...) as the basis for an implementation of the AutoCompleteFacet.
[WON'T FIX] Use @DomainService(repositoryFor=...) as the basis for an implementation of the PluralNameFacet
[WON'T FIX] [DUPLICATE] Create a custom distribution of TomEE containing the Isis jars
[WON'T FIX] Extend Isis metamodel and Wicket viewer so that a "delete" action can be automatically provided for deleteable objects.
Provide the capability to push notification messages to end-users without refreshing (using web sockets or Atmosphere etc).
Support editing/preview using Asciidoctor (perhaps as an Isis addon)
[WON'T FIX] Enhance isis-maven-plugin to generate UML class diagrams from metamodel
Property#projecting attribute: provide redirect hints so that when the user clicks on a rendered link, the viewer instead navigates to some other entity.  (also fixed in "v1 maintenance")
[WON'T FIX] Support Spring.Data like repositories with automatic implemenation of methods such as findByName or findByStartDateAndStatus
Integrate with Keycloak
[DUPLICATE] Create standalone JAR of an Isis app
[WON'T FIX] Extend the framework's metamodel to be able to render List<Map<String,Object>>
[WON'T FIX] Automated testing tool to act as a webcrawler, clicking on all links and assert that the page is rendered correctly.
Move paraname8 into core.
[WON'T FIX] Integrate Kryo as an alternative technology for view models
Simplify syntax way for mixins, to better express intent using @Action, @Collection and @Property
Dynamically hide/disable/default action parameters (based on other parameter arguments) (also fixed in "v1 maintenance")
Experimental Support for DataNucleus Federated Datastore
Allow multiple layouts to be defined, and a helper method such as "layout()" that returns which to use, similar to iconName() and cssClass().
Allow sidebar vs modal to be specified on action-by-action basis using @ActionLayout or XML (also fixed in "v1 maintenance")
Improve rebuildMetaModel to return the target object rather than void (also fixed in "v1 maintenance")
Support multiple layouts for a domain object, switchable using layout() (similar to iconName() or cssClass())  (also fixed in "v1 maintenance")
Provide "redirect even when same" control on action-by-action basis  (also fixed in "v1 maintenance")
Allow the dialogMode default for object actions vs service actions be specified separately.
Allow upload of interim builds to repo.incode.work (also fixed in "v1 maintenance")
Allow event subscribers to change the returned value of an action in the EXECUTED phase.
Support for Server Sent Events (SSE)
Resurrect Module with fixture support.
Resurrect mvn plugin functionality as integ test extensions.
Rationalize pom hierarchy with respect to Spring Boot starter-parent.
Add WebModule to support CORS
Port pdfjs from incode platform as an extension
Integrate Spring Boot flyway as an extension.
Initial project structure for the Vaadin viewer
[WON'T FIX] Remove ObjectSpecificationOnStandaloneList, replace with appropriate FacetFactory's that install relevant facets for ObjectList type.
[WON'T FIX] Get rid of ActionChoicesFacet and ActionDefaultsFacet, replace with ActionParameterChoicesFacet / ActionParameterDefaultFacet
Remove FieldOrderFacet and ActionOrderFacet, replace instead with MemberOrderFacet
[WON'T FIX] Renaming getName() and other methods in metamodel
[WON'T FIX] The validate() method should apply for updates as well as for objects being initially persisted.
[WON'T FIX] Validation failure for properties of type enum that have no default and are mandatory.
[WON'T FIX] Allow logging to be configured using JMX, possibly support other real-time metrics/analytics.
Improve performance of rendering lists (in Wicket viewer) (also fixed in "v1 maintenance")
Now we have support for view models, we could simplify matters elsewhere by removing support for transient objects.
[WON'T FIX] Simplify Facet API, get rid of isNoop concept
Improve the way we setup logging to vary between prod and test, and independent of viewer.
@Inject on field and @RequestScoped are incompatible - use a MetaModelValidator to detect
Remove @NotPersistable annotation and corresponding facet
Support autoComplete with dependent choices.
[WON'T FIX] [DUPLICATE] Bundle up Isis apps using TomEE Maven plugin rather than jetty-console
Update all Wicket viewer HTML to use html5 doctype (also fixed in "v1 maintenance")
[WON'T FIX] Allow the prototype facet to be associated with properties and collections, not just actions.
Integ Tests: allow them to simulate a new Authentication Session
[WON'T FIX] [DUPLICATE] validate() should be called and enforced when invoking an action.
[WON'T FIX] Use CDI to wire up Isis components.
[WON'T FIX] Provide a mvn -D property (or similar) to allow the .pot translations file either to be generated or not generated as required.
[WON'T FIX] Provide the capability to disable the browser's back button/
[WON'T FIX] for JAXB view models, implement member ordering from the @XmlType#propOrder attribute and other semantics.
Simplify/unify session and xactn management for Wicket viewer and RO viewer
Refactor/simplify ExceptionRecognitionService to follow chain-of-responsibility pattern.
[WON'T FIX] Suggest  changed the web.xml to newer Servlet Deployment Descriptor - version 3.1 and added absolute-ordering element
Handle default methods defined in interfaces (JDK8)
[WON'T FIX] Replace WithTransactionScope in applib to instead support @TransactionScoped
Rename @Property(notPersisted=...) to @Property(mementoSerialization=...)
Remove support in Memento (internal class) for transient (JDO) entities
Remove org.apache.isis.applib.fixtures.InstallableFixture, replace with FixtureScripts
[Duplicate] JEE 7+ Support
[WON'T FIX] integration test given/when/then sections
Delete CukeGlueBootstrappingAbstract, since of no practicable use.
[WONT FIX] Tree View: allow tree-node icon decorators (overlay-icons)
Java Module Path Support
Action background execution: provide built-in default implementation
reimplementing a JAX-RS 2.0 restful client for Isis from scratch
[superceded] Merge up AppManifest2 into AppManifest, untangle those builders
[WON'T FIX] For integ tests, allow individual services to be removed from the system.
Using 'show all' on tables does take longer than expected
Redesign of Configuration
LogonFixture is deprecated, replace by FixtureScript (see also ISIS-2133)
Amend CI Builds by Sonarqube Analysis
Fix Sonar Findings (also fixed in "v1 maintenance")
Convert website to use Antora
Remove all of isis-core-webserver (since no longer have o.a.i.WebServer)
Remove support for guava event bus implementation, because ...
Define beans for configuration, so that (eventually) can use Spring Boot's @ConfigurationProperties infrastructure.
TreeView: algorithm for finding a nodes postion among its siblings is broken
TreeView: provide a custom theme for trees - 'bootstrap style'
Extend MessageService API with additional overloads  (also fixed in "v1 maintenance")
Applib Blob and Clob should implement equals and hashCode  (also fixed in "v1 maintenance")
Darkly Theme: buttons and fieldset-headers have same background-color
Move LayoutUiEvent from o.a.i.applib.eventbus to o.a.i.applib.event.ui
The framework should re-connect to the database if it is lost (eg after an overnight DB restore in a test environment)  (also fixed in "v1 maintenance")
Reduce call-site complexity of 'BuilderScripts'
TreeView: when for any reason the tree-model is empty don't NPE, create empty component instead
mixin to download metamodel in XML for each class (also fixed in "v1 maintenance")
Fix CSS for sidebar, buttons not visible if lots of params (also fixed in "v1 maintenance")
Make WebModules plugable (SPI)
Move the Isis-2-Demo into the Isis Project
Remove DataNucleus-4 Module (Plugin)
Remove Resteasy-3 Module (Plugin)
Use Spring Boot for 'Service Provisioning'
Don't use shared instances of 'Random'
Change layout of datetime widget so that is fully visible in sidebar (also fixed in "v1 maintenance")
Provide a PlatformTransactionManager for Isis/Jdo
Align package names with their module/project names that they are contained in.
Simplify how to provide a Hompage for the Wicket-Viewer
Port Incode's Excel module to 'v2' and include with Isis
Make specsupport/cucumber an extension module
Make fixturescript support an extension module
[WONT FIX] Make joda-time support an extension module
DemoApp: enable syntax highlighting for the descriptive texts
Replace the isis-maven-plugin with (predefined) integration tests
Pull in Dan's maven-mixins
Drop 'menuOrder' in DomainService and DomainServiceLayout
Migrate to using a shared SupplementalModelArtifact
NatureOfService: Remove deprecated VIEW_MENU_ONLY and  VIEW_CONTRIBUTIONS_ONLY
Introduce AsciiDoc and Markdown as new value types.
Move the Object_downloadMetaModelXml into the applib.
New mixins to expose the objectType and objectIdentifier as properties in the "metadata" fieldset.
Provide a more sophisticated "fallback" layout if none is available.
Tidy up helloworld and simpleapp and then move to their own repos, with minimal parent hierarchy.
Moves static files (applib xsd, scheme xsd) into _partials so published automatically.
Drop module 'log4j'
Pull in Incode's security modul as an extension
FactoryService (API): remove 'm' shortcut, add 'viewModel'
Remove support for persistent object concurrency checking
Introduce a BlobClobFactory and a ZipWriter
Security Manager Extension: Memory Leak w/ PrincipalForApplicationUser
Concurrent framework Initialization is broken
Remove domain-object member naming restrictions (reserved prefixes)
Provide a semantic counterpart to @Programmatic
Convert IsisSystemEnvironment to a simple Spring-managed bean.
Extend helloworld and simpleapp to have maven deps lockdown test, under a profile flag (disable by default).
Add dependencyManagement for spring-boot into isis core.
Enable github actions and package registry for interim builds.
Display welcome page for demo apps (helloworld and simpleapp)
Remove WebModuleStaticResources ... we should just use SpringBoot's support
Enable actuator for helloworld and simpleapp
Exceptions are being swallowed on start up, making it tricky to diagnose (simply see tomcat shutting down)
Remove the 'Version' in OIDs
Move bytebuddy into core, move jaxrs into RO viewer; reorg folders
Convert all remaining plugins (ServiceLoader) into regular service beans.
Rationalize @Order of our service beans to use enum constants.
Split RO viewer's applib, move the client stuff into an extension ("ro-client-v1" or similar)
Bring incode-platform's base, excel, fakedata & unittestsupport in as extensions
Remove concept of "discoverability" for fixture scripts, sort out fixtureResult layout
HealthCheckService should integrate with Spring Boot's actuator infra.
ExceptionRecognizer not working - eg attempt to create 2 Hello World objects with same name.
Clean up RepositoryService API (resurrect firstMatch, don't use varargs for ranges)
Improve the mavendeps-testing, to avoid accidental junit 4 dependency
TranslationServicePo should always log translations on shutdown
Performance optimisation: short-circuit searching for actions if possible
Ignore static methods in the metamodel completely.
Allow ClassSubstitutor to be managed as a Spring-managed component
Remove welcome.file config settings and welcome text
Resurrect commented out metamodel validation re: supporting methods
Improve the ordering in the Swagger UI.
Configure a Spring Boot fallback error page.
Exclude org.springframework from the metamodel
Break runtime-extensions module into separate responsibilities
Create an incubator catalog and a legacy catalog, similar to extensions.
Move schema.utils package in applib under o.a.i.applib package
Move h2console/h2managermenu and hsqldbmanager out into isis-extensions.
[WON'T FIX] Factor out Swagger UI as a separate "viewer" module
Rename runtime-web to webapp, and tidy up
Avoid package splitting, in prep for possible JPMS support in future.
Introduce @Module as a meta-annotation for @ComponentScan and @Configuration.
Remove usage of @ComponentScan, instead explicitly @Import all services etc.
Standardize service @Ordered, @Named, @Primary
Rename ext fixture's Module interface to ModuleWithFixtures
Remove AuthenticationManager interface, just use AuthenticationManagerStandard as default impl.
Move LDAP Realm implementation into an extension.
Mitigate Reliability and Security Issues as detected by Code Quality Analysis
Integrate Smoketests with the CI Build
Simplify config metadata for wicket footer credits.
Let TitleService fallback to Enum.name() as the Title Provider
Sequence WebModules correctly.
Move WebModuleRestfulObjects into the resteasy plugin module.
Use @Validated for base-path config properties
Use WebModule infra to inject into all servlets, filters etc.
Remove _Resources_RestfulPath
Use IsisSystemEnvironment to store the context path, rather than _Resources static method.
Use resteasy-spring-boot-starter to configure jaxrs-resteasy
Remove IsisJaxrsServerPlugin
provide an IsisPreset for specifying the log4j2-test.xml file when running integ tests.
Store the MetaModelContext in DN's NucleusContext
Deprecate Magnitude<T> and implementing Value Types
Optionally prevent new ObjectSpec's once metamodel fully created; and revalidate new ObjectSpec's otherwise.
In WrapperFactory, lookup mixin properties and collections (as well as actions).
Documentation Typos and AsciiDoc improvements
Reorganize extensions into several smaller groupings.
Allow the baseUri of the RO viewer to be overridden
Remove ExceptionRecognizer.recognize(Throwable) in favor of recognize2(Throwable)
Update RO spec in support of java.time
Rationalize configuration properties hierarchy, in line with groupId / artifactId
Rename OrderPrecedence literals
Port fullcalendar over from incode-platform as an extension.
Simplify @HomePage support - just use as annotation on type, not for an action.
Move most of core-unittestsupport into testing.  Perhaps all of it.
Properties should be disabled by default.

Reinstate mechanism to run a specified fixture class on startup.
SecMan: convert any actions in 'jdo' to mixins and move to 'model'
Convert BDD Cucumber to use JUnit5 test platform engine (rather than legacy JUnit4)
Rename WithTransactionScope interface to eg. TransactionScopeListener
Vaadin Viewer: Login Page
Demo App: add more scalar types not covered yet
Vaadin Viewer: Action calls need an IsisSession
Vaadin Viewer: Isis Preset Debug Logging not honored
Remove the concept of transient objects and of @NotPersistable; instead we have view models.
